message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $120. I believe it's a great deal for its value.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $100 for it. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $110?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $95 for the product. I hope this meets within your acceptable range.
